abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Amore Opera production of Saverio Mercadante opera I Due Figaro.
snippet: The Amore Opera presented the American premiere of Saverio Mercadante’s “Due Figaro,” an opera based on an obscure French sequel to the Beaumarchais Figaro play cycle.
lead_paragraph: The Amore Opera presented the American premiere of Saverio Mercadante’s “Due Figaro,” an opera based on an obscure French sequel to the Beaumarchais Figaro play cycle.

headline.main: A Brazen Scheme to Win The Daughter of a Count
headline.print_headline: A Brazen Scheme to Win The Daughter of a Count
headline.seo: ‘I Due Figaro’ at Connelly Theater - Review
